location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, to William Mackinnon

physicalDescription.extent: The letter book has been turned upside down and the correspondence relating to banking and financial matters has been entered from back to front, therefore the correspondence itself is upside down in relation to the folio numbers.

mods.abstract: Note regarding selling his shares in the British India Steam Navigation Company including arranging for his papers, which are with Smith, Elder & Co, to be handed over to Mackinnon.
